Just Spring

作者：Mike Loukides

The Spring Framework has found a very strong user base over the years. Software houses and enterprises found the framework to be the best fit for their plumbing needs.

Surprisingly, the core principle that Spring has been built for—the Dependency Injec-tion (DI)—is very simple to understand. This chapter discusses the fundamentals of the framework from a high ground. It helps the reader understand the dependency injection principles. The chapter opens up with a simple problem of object coupling and dependencies. It then explains how to solve the them using Spring Framework.
